net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.block
Class TextFilterBlockTaglet

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.AbstractSimpleTaglet
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.impl.TextFilterTaglet
          net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.block.TextFilterBlockTaglet
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockTaglet, SimpleTaglet
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefinitionListBlockTaglet, ParamBlockTaglet, SimpleRegexBlockTaglet
public class TextFilterBlockTaglet
extends TextFilterTaglet
implements BlockTaglet

Block taglet that uses a text filter to process the input texts.

The taglet produces a text that simply consists of the concatenated, filtered input texts.

Version:
1.10 (2008/03/30 12:43:21)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.3.0

getOutput

public String getOutput(Logger logger,
                        Parameter parameter,
                        String[] texts)
Description copied from interface: BlockTaglet
Returns the output for the specified input texts.

The input texts are fully resolved, i.e. if they contain further inline tags they are first resolved before being passed to this method.

For each block tag that appears in the documentation a separate input text is created. Once all input texts for a given section of the documentation have been collected they are passed in to this method.

Specified by:
getOutput in interface BlockTaglet
Implementation Notes:
Returns a string consisting of the concatenated, filtered version of the input texts.
Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for emiting messages.
parameter - the parameter for the tag currently processed.
texts - the fully resolved tag texts.
Returns:
the output text to use in the documentation.
Since:
1.3.0
